seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Sr Data Engineer' and requires 5+ years of experience, aligning with senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Sr Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL, and cloud data platforms

sub_specialty.evidence: Emphasis on ETL workflows, data warehousing, and orchestration with Airflow suggests batch processing focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: Explicitly mentions mentoring junior engineers and providing technical leadership without indicating direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery as core platforms, indicating multi-cloud environment

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major clouds are mentioned as part of the data architecture, with no single primary cloud specified

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL workflows, data warehousing, and Airflow orchestration indicates batch processing orientation

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow explicitly mentioned as required workflow orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Primary storage systems mentioned are AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery - all data warehouse solutions

remote_restriction.evidence: Explicitly states 'Onsite role- no remote work' with location restriction to Minneapolis, MN

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to Minneapolis, MN (US) with no mention of global or multi-timezone operations

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Minneapolis, MN with no remote work option implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship in the job posting or extracted data

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and requirement for 5+ years experience suggests not suitable for OPT/CPT candidates

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned, but onsite role in US implies need for work authorization

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits package suggests W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including medical, dental, vision, 401k, ESPP, HSA, FSA, tuition reimbursement, and paid parental leave

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'promotional opportunities' and 'career development' but no specific career tracks or ladder

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly states 'Mentor and guide junior data engineers, providing technical leadership and career development support'

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'promotional opportunities' in the benefits section

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: Mentions mentoring (IC track) and leadership skills (management track) as requirements, suggesting both paths may be available

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (12 items) and nice-to-have skills (3 items), with balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description with specific responsibilities around data pipelines, cloud platforms, and data governance

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are reasonable for a senior role with 5+ years experience, including cloud platforms, Spark, Airflow, and mentoring
